items.title: Best and easiest way to sterilize baby bottles - UV sterilization
items.content_html:
Baby is vulnerable to diseases and illnesses, so you will want to ensure their bottles are clean and germ free until baby’s immune system developed providing a much higher tolerance to bacterias and germs. Sterilizing bottles can have different ways. Some require more efforts and times and some need more cautions. There are many ways to sterilize baby bottles.

  • Use electric steamers
  • Use Microwave
  • Use boiling water
  • Use UV sterilizer
  • Sterilizing Tablets
  • Many other ways.

The best and easiest way to sterilize baby bottles at home is use UV sterilizer if you can get one. Why use UV sterilizer?

  1. It does not use water, so no worry about germ from steamers water.
  2. No need to boil. Plastic bottle safe.
  3. UV can kill viruses, germs and bacteria (99.9% rate).
  4. Some sterilizer offer dryer function, save your time for sleep!

The only con of this method is usually UV sterilizer is a bit expensive compare to other methods. There are not a lot of options of UV sterilizer in the market. You don’t want a products that can only sterilize one bottle or one nipple at a time because you will have more than one bottle need to be sterilized. If you don’t know which one to get, you can consider the Wabi Baby Touch Panel Dual Function UV Sterilizer & Dryer.

It is available at Amazon and Wabi’s website.

Get one from Amazon: Wabi Baby Touch Panel Dual Function UV Sterilizer & Dryer

Wabi Baby Touch Panel Dual Function UV Sterilizer & Dryer have sterilizer and dryer function so all you need to do is wash the bottles and put them into Wabi UV sterilizer & dryer. We tested one Wabi Baby Touch Panel Dual Function UV Sterilizer & Dryer and found it is a nice product for family with new baby. Wabi UV sterilizer & dryer is not the small one you usually see in the market. The box width is about the mid size computer case. But it is lighter than it looks like.

You will find this UV sterilizer looks very well made and nice.

It has touch panel for function control. Very simple and easy to use.

Not too small, but not too big. We use 8oz bottle in our test.

Looks very cool also when it is on.

We tested the UV and dryer function for a set of bottles. After the full cycle complete, all bottles were dry and feels clean. It does left some warm feeling when finish, but that is totally normal.

items.title: Get Free $25 Cricket Wireless Credit for New Customer - Expired
items.content_html:
Why use Cricket Wireless?

  • Cricket Wireless uses AT&T cell towers so it will have native AT&T coverage plus some domestic roaming.
  • You can even have Canada and Mexico roaming coverage when traveling by paying $10 more.
  • Cricket Wireless get new feature even faster than AT&T’s prepaid plan (former AT&T gophone). For example, Cricket Wireless user have VoLTE (Voice over LTE) now while AT&T’s prepaid plan still missing that option.
  • Tax is included. Why pay 20% more tax?
  • Affordable family plan, 5 lines for $100! No hidden fee.
  • Local stores everywhere if you need assistence
  • Cricket Wireless offer more GB than other competitors in same price.

The only downside is Cricket Wireless limit the max LTE peak download speeds to 8 Mbps, however, that is fast enough to watch HD video. If you’re a new customer looking to try Cricket Wireless and want to save even more, you can use our  referral for a $25 Credit for each line. If you’re planning on moving multiple lines, after you activate your own line, then refer your other lines so you receive your own $25 credit for each line! After you have them all transferred, you should be able to group them all together for some major group discounts by calling customer service.

***Cricket no longer offer referral credit now.

How to claim the $25 credit?

  1. Open the referral link: Cricket Rewards
  2. Set up your Cricket Rewards account
  3. Activate Cricket service within 30 days of the referral and update your phone number within the Cricket Rewards app if you got a new one.
  4. Keep your account active and in good standing for 60 days.

You can refer your friend using the Cricket Rewards account too. Both parties will receive $25 Credit.
